Then, we relax the realizability assumption by replacing the "target labeling function" with more flexible, a data-labels generating distribution.

UML_3: Ti thiu ri ro thc nghim vi xu hng quy np | 2.3.

date_range 05/04/2020 23:25

uml3

2.3. Ti thiu ri ro thc nghim vi xu hng quy np
  • bi vit trc, chng ta chng minh phng php ERM c th dn n overfitting. By gi chng ta s tm cch ci thin n bng vic tm cc iu kin m bo ERM khng b overfit.
  • Mt trong nhng phng php chung khi thc hin ERM l gii hn khng gian tm kim. C th, b hc s chn trc mt tp cc hm d on (trc khi nhn thy d liu). Tp cc hm d on ny gi l "khng gian gi thuyt" (hypothesis class), k hiu l . Mi hm nh x . Cho trc v , b hc s dng ERM chn ra hm d on sao cho li trn nh nht:
  • La chn khng gian hn ch l tng khi c hiu bit trc v vn cn hc. V d, v vn d on tri u chn hay cha ( cp bi vit trc), chng ta c th chn gi thuyt l tp cc hnh ch nht (vi cc cnh song song vi trc). phn di, chng ta s chng minh cho khng gian gi thuyt ny khng b overfit.
  • Cu hi t ra by gi l: Khng gian gi thuyt nh no th gip trnh c overfitting? Hy cng nhau khm ph phn cn li ca bi vit.
